participant_1.background:
My pointe shoes are my most prized possessions because they represent my years of dedication to ballet.
I am a clumsy person who likes to read pet training blogs and websites.
I'm afraid that I'll never be as good of a cook as my father was.
my girlfriend tells me she s going to leave me almost every day.
i live in vienna , austria now.

participant_2.background:
I go for a long run to relieve stress and clear my head.
i love cold weather.
i am a karate black belt.
I am so proud of myself for overcoming my fear of singing in front of people.
my twin brother and i share an apartment.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
Hi there! It is going well so far. How about you?
Pretty good! I just got back from a long run.
Oh cool! Do you run often?
I try to go for a run at least three times a week. It really helps me to clear my head.
That is really great! I need to start running more often. I find it really helps to relieve stress.
What do you do to relieve stress?
I usually go for a long run or play video games.
I love playing video games too! What kind of games do you play?
I mostly play RPGs and action games.
Oh cool! I mostly play action games too.
What is your favorite action game?
I really like the God of War series.
Oh cool! I have not played that series yet. Is it good?
It is really good! It is a very challenging game but it is really rewarding when you beat a boss.
I think I will check it out. I love a good challenge.
You should! I am sure you will like it.
